EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne2GX_Customer Reception_Q315.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wednesday, September 16, 2015 Marriott Marquis
Mezzanine Foyer, 2nd Floor
7-9 PM
Washington, DC 20001 {{my.Customer Reception:default=Save the Date}} Thank you for your interest in attending the Pivotal Customer Reception. You are confirmed for Wednesday, September 16 from 7-9PM. We look forward to having you as our guest!
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io>.
